title: Partner Fields

fields.label: Partner Image
fields.name: partner_image
fields.instructions: Partner logo or image. If not set, the featured image will be used.

fields.label: Partner Description
fields.name: partner_text
fields.instructions: Description text about the partner. If not set, the post excerpt will be used.

fields.label: Partner Website Link
fields.name: partner_link
fields.instructions: Optional link to the partner's website. If provided, the partner image will be clickable.

description: Additional fields for partners including image, description text, and website link.
